short_definition: An essential element of a criminal offense which must be proved by the district attorney; specifically, the prosecution must prove that a death occurred and it is the result of murder.
long_definition_html: An essential element of a criminal offense which must be proved by the district attorney; specifically, the prosecution must prove that a death occurred and it is the result of murder.
